movies.title: Black Is Blue
movies.plot: Black - once Blue - is now a trans man who works as a security guard in an apartment complex in Oakland. One night, Black notices an ex- girlfriend partying with some other women in one of the buildings. As none of the other security guards want to watch 'the lezzie party', Black volunteers to, thinking he may resolve some inner conflicts from the past. However, things take a turn for the worse.

biography.bio: Lisa Evans is an actor, known for Black Is Blue (2014).
biography.name: Lisa Evans

biography.bio: Kingston Farady is an actor, known for Advocates (2017), Transcend (2016) and Black Is Blue (2018).
biography.name: Kingston Farady

biography.bio: Andre Le Blanc is an actor, known for Black Is Blue (2014).
biography.name: Andre Le Blanc

biography.bio: "The Baroness", Bianca Von Krieg Austrian born actress (film and TV) and model (most alt and queer) She's had several appearances on national (HBO & Fox), local TV (San Francisco and independent films. Originally from Austria she's an actual baroness. Raised in Pebble Beach, CA - near Carmel Graduated Stanford University and MIT. In computer science and economics. She is trans-gender (born male) but transitioned to female following her college years Her mother was a courtesan of Greek ancestry. Her father, "the Baron", is of German aristocracy. Additionally father's family was actually one of the pioneering families of California, before repatriating back to Europe! She is descended from the same bloodline as George Washington and born on the same day! In her spare time she enjoys, running, cooking, discos, shopping science, travel, history and aviation (has her pilot license). And spending time with her Jack Russell mix and love of her life!
biography.name: Bianca Von Krieg
